    • Constructor Detail

      • Lightning

        public Lightning(java.lang.String imageKey,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 java.lang.String playerAddress,
                 double dir,
                 double delay,
                 Lightning attached,
                 long time)
        Creates a Lightning Attack which chains with others
        Parameters:
        imageKey - The key to the image
        x - X-position
        y - Y-position
        playerAddress - The player IP address
        dir - Direction of the attack
        delay - The delay before starting
        attached - The Lightning object this one is attached to
        time - The server start time
